articles.title: Dow futures fall 200 points on escalating Israel-Iran conflict, weak retail sales: Live updates - CNBC
articles.summary: Stocks fall on escalating Israel-Iran conflict, weak retail sales: Live updates Traders work on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York City. Stocks were lower on Tuesday as investors pored through the latest developments in the Middle East, with the conflict between Israel and Iran raging on. Wall Street also digested weak retail sales data.
